title: The Iron Heel

cover.alt: Blue book cover with a sun emanating rays at the top, and at the bottom the text 'The / Iron Heel / Jack London'.

overview: A dystopian novel by Jack London, describing attempts to revolt against an oligarchic authoritarian American regime, which rose in reaction to socialistic sentiment.  Eventually the rebels succeed, but it takes them centuries to take down the 'Iron Heel'.

incidents.description: Despite the popularity of London's adventure stories in Germany, the Nazi regime could not let stand London's praise of socialism, and his criticism of an imaginary regime that had definite resemblances to later European Fascism.  They {ln:https://encyclopedia.ushmm.org/content/en/article/jack-london|banned and burned this work in 1933}.
